pingball.simulation.gadget

Class Gadget

  • java.lang.Object
    • pingball.simulation.GameObject
      • pingball.simulation.gadget.Gadget
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Absorber, CircleBumper, Flipper, SquareBumper, TriangleBumper

    public abstract class Gadget
extends GameObject
    A gadget is a triggerable game object. A gadget can be a Circular Bumper, a Triangular Bumper, a Square Bumper, a Flipper or an Absorber.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Gadget.Orientation
      An enum to represent the orientation of a flipper or a trianglular bumper.

      • Gadget

        public Gadget(Board board,
      java.lang.String name,
      GridLocation location,
      double reflectionCoeff)
        Creates a Gadget.
        Parameters:
        board - The Board object on which this gadget is.
        name - The name of this gadget.
        location - The Grid Location of the top left corner of the gadget.
        reflectionCoeff - The reflection coefficient of the gadget.

      • linkGadget

        public final boolean linkGadget(Gadget gadget)
        Adds a gadget to the list of gadgets whose action is performed when this gadget is triggered.
        Parameters:
        gadget - The gadget to be linked to this gadget
        Returns:
        true of the addition was successful, false otherwise

      • unlinkGadget

        public final boolean unlinkGadget(Gadget gadget)
        Removes a gadget from the list of gadgets whose action is performed when this gadget is triggered.
        Parameters:
        gadget - The gadget to be unlinked from this gadget
        Returns:
        true if the removal was successful, false otherwise

      • collide

        public void collide(Ball ball,
           Collidable collidable)
        Collides the ball with a particular collidable in this gadget. The collidable must be a part of this gadget.
        Overrides:
        collide in class GameObject
        Parameters:
        ball - The ball to collide
        collidable - The collidable with which the ball collides
